transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir call drop kar ja rahi hai thoda jio ka network ka problem hai yahan pe.
Customer: Nahi mere jio mein tumhari dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Sir wahi matlab cost aapka wahi aa raha hai sir per category lakh lakh plus GST aa raha hai na to man lijiye do category lete hain to do lakh plus GST ho jayega aapka.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hai na?
Executive: To do lakh plus GST dene se achcha mujhe lagta hai 3 lakh 11 including GST agar aap denge to wo aapke liye jyada fruitful rahega sir.
Customer: 3 lakh ka kaun sa package le le to better rehta bol de.
Executive: Main bata raha hun sir jo do category aap chala rahe ho usko preferred star mein convert kar lo matlab ki India page pe bhi aap dikhoge usse aur aapki jitni bhi cities aap buylead le rahe ho na wo sara cover hoga aapka.
Executive: Un sari jagah pe aap as an star supplier dikhoge.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: To aapke pass call aur inquiry ka flow increase karega aapko ultimately chahiye to business na sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ultimately to business aapko badhana hai na business to aise hi badhega jab aap jyada jagah dikhoge to jyada jagah se bikoge.
Executive: Abhi 10-10 city mein hi karte rahoge to fir wo wahi 10 city mein rotate hote rahoge aap.
Customer: Do meter ke teen ka pal dega.
Executive: Baki decision aapka hai.
Executive: Aapka budget apna bata dijiye us hisab se main aapko bata dunga jo aapke suitable rahega.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Nahi ki nahi.
Customer: [inaudible].
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: [inaudible] close kar abhi le.
Customer: Hmm ji bolo.
Executive: Bas main keh raha hun apna aap wo budget bata dijiyega to main dekh ke bata dunga jo aapke liye suitable rahega.
Customer: Budget best to suitable daam jyada lagne par mere ko fruitfulness hona.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Wo 311 mein to hai sahi sir usme koi problem nahi.
Customer: 5 lakh tak main rakhne ke liye ready hun.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: To leader vider ke liye jane ka man hai sir leader services ye star ke upar aata hai leader.
Customer: Leader bahut cost pad jata na.
Executive: Costing aa jati hai costing aa jati hai jyada lekin usme competition bhi aapka bahut high hai sir ek baat aur bata dun jaise Arcon engineering hai guru kripa engineers continental enterprises Epson steels burhani machinery stores mahalaxmi traders ha aur SBH scaffolding India private limited prime steel tech private limited theek hai yahan tak sirf leading supplier ka naam bataya all India page pe dikh rahe hain ek do teen char panch che saat aath aath to leading supplier hi hain fir uske baad star supplier ek do teen char panch jo India page pe dikh rahe hain.
Customer: Hamara product aisa product hai.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: North India mein jyada nahi lete south India mein jyada apna product aaj tak hum north India mein export nahi kare wo hai nahi bheje pura idhar hi chalta.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: [inaudible] de deta hun 150 badh ke de do.
Executive: To to abhi to sir meri baat aap man lo ki yahi do category ko aap preferred star karao pehle to.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Fir uske baad aap aage business preferred star kitna hoga kitna hoga 311000 including GST.
Customer: Wahi bol raha hun na 550 se de deta hun.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Dono including GST dono category aapki.
Customer: Theek hai ye kuch bhi nahi badhega na mere ko lead thoda thoda category badha ke naya field aur aur bhi leads bhi jyada hona ye to mere scaffolding ke liye barabar ho ja rahe hain main pipe ka bhi start karna bhul gaya hun trading.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha.
Customer: To main bataun sir usi ke sath na I am star do category aur laga liya jayega preferred star mein kara lijiye do category aur do ya to aisa karta hun main lead badhane ke liye lead badhao.
Customer: [inaudible] jitna weekly rehta mere ko pehle hi teen din mein khatam ho jata.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Ab aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir ji sir.
Executive: Haan main main bataun.
Executive: Haan bataun agar aapko lead badhana hai to I am star 10 wali hi category jo I am star 10 aap chala rahe ho na isi ki do ya teen category aap aur add kara lo.
Executive: To aapka jo buylead ka location hai na wo per category per lead per category sorry per category 14-14 leads badh jayegi.
Customer: Matlab abhi mere ko man lete hain abhi mere ko kitna tha so lead mein.
Executive: Abhi aapko kitna milta hai dekho main batata hun.
Executive: Abhi aapko milta hai 44 plus char daily basis pe matlab exactly bataun to 72 weekly milti hai sir.
Customer: Haan 72 weekly.
Executive: Theek hai ab 72 mein aap 28 aur add kar lo sir.
Customer: Isme direct thoda company hi provide karti to wo kya hai wo direct inquiry thode message type mein deti wo wo direct company deti kya wo.
Executive: Direct inquiry hoga sir.
Customer: Haan to main ye package kitne din hua leke main I am star 10.
Executive: Sir abhi to september mein to aapne liya tha.
Customer: Ek mahina hi hua.
Executive: Haan september mein aapne liya hai to mujhe dikh raha hai.
Customer: Exact date bolo aap.
Executive: Exact date bataun.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Batata hun september 12 september.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: 12 september se starting date hai aapki.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: 12 september yani do mahine ho gaya.
Executive: Haan sir do mahina ho gaya.
Customer: October mein dabras aaye ye mahina utna nahi raha na.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ye mahina utna tha kya call volume.
Executive: Volume matlab ye mahine ka report nahi dikha raha tha.
Executive: Abhi sir wo jab pura mahina band close ho jayega na to report aapka generate ho jayega abhi to weekly weekly dikhayega.
Executive: Monthly nahi dikhayega na sir abhi.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Haan monthly close hone pe dikhata hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Aur main aapka dekh pa raha hun sir inquiry ka flow kafi achcha ho gaya pehle se call response rate bhi call response rate pe thoda sa humko dekhna padega call jyada miss na ho theek hai sir reviews aapke bahut achche hain 4.6 out of five hai hai na aur aapka jo hai lead manager ka usage aap log bahut achcha kar rahe ho is wajah se aap achcha business kar pa rahe ho matlab aap cheezon ko na handle bhi se kar rahe ho aapne manpower rakh rakhi hai is cheez ke liye hai na thoda sa catalog pe score pe kam karana padega 71% hai apne ek bar employee ko boliyega ki thoda sa apna catalog pe kam kar le 80 hi product hai aapka score at least 80% plus to hona hi chahiye theek hai aur char product sir aapke aise hain na jisme aap log lead purchase kar rahe ho theek hai lekin usko as a product nahi add karaya aapne theek hai naam bataun main aapko centering plates scaffolding system centering prop scaffolding pipes inki lead purchase ho rahi hai lekin aapke company mein employees mein wo add nahi kare in char product ko centering plate scaffolding system centering prop scaffolding pipes.
Executive: Boliye ki is naam se add kar de product ko char product theek hai sir theek hai aur baki sir main abhi ek closer aapko bhejunga aapka jo complaint thi na ki wo change kara do wo main ha sir feedback sir mere liye de dijiyega Ashraf sir hai na mere liye mere liye feedback aayega Ashraf ke naam ke liye five star ji ha matlab rating ka aata hai usme satisfied karenge tab fir mere bare mein aap matlab thoda sa agar do char line likh denge to company bhi samjhegi na ki ha kam kar raha hai ya cheezon ko bataya solution diya achcha tabhi samne customer ne uske liye reply diya hai.
Executive: Hai ki nahi sir baki jo category addition ka na main aapko bhejta hun kya nahi dikha raha tha aapko abhi nahi aaya hoga sir abhi maine bheja nahi na abhi jab main call close karunga tab fir main bhej paunga aapko aur main aapko fir whatsapp pe text bhi karta hun sari category ka price bhi de deta hun fir aapko jaisa suitable rahe lage to us hisab se kar liya jayega preferred star sahi lagega to preferred star nahi to I am star ki category badha li jayegi 10-10 wale ki to usse kya hoga leads aapko 14-14 per category jo hai 14-14 lead aapki badhegi to wo kar liya jayega hai na jo suitable lage aapko aapke budget mein ho aur aap aapka jisse kam nikle sahi jyada paisa lena hoga tab to main aapko leader hi suggest karunga lekin mujhe paisa jyada nahi lena hai mujhe aapke according samajhna hai ki aapke liye kya suitable hai theek hai theek hai hai na to main abhi aapko message text karta hun whatsapp pe theek hai sir mere liye please sir feedback dilwa dijiyega na 100% sure theek theek thank you sir thank you.
Executive: Have a nice day sir. Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a fruitful package.

- Wants to know about the 3 lakh package.

- Wants to increase leads.

- Wants to know why the monthly report is not showing.

- Wants to change the complaint.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested preferred star package.

- Executive explained about the I am star 10 package.

- Executive explained about the leading suppliers.

- Executive informed that the monthly report will generate after month end.

- Executive assured to send the closer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send category addition details on WhatsApp.

- Customer will provide feedback for the executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, leads, package, feedback, category
